actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide for additional Federal payments to States to reflect the higher medicaid costs resulting from the enactment of the supplemental security income benefit program.

summary.text: Sets forth a formula under title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide for additional Federal payments to States to reflect the higher medicaid costs resulting from the enactment of the supplemental security income benefit program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide for additional Federal payments to States to reflect the higher medicaid costs resulting from the enactment of the supplemental security income benefit program.
